short_summary: CFIA Ottawa Lab Fallowfield has a need for a Reverse Vertical Laminar Flow Cabinet
description: THIS REQUEST IS RESERVED FOR HOLDERS OF SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT # E60PV-19EQUI ONLY, FOR THE PURCHASE OF LABORATORY AND SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT, PARTS AND ACCESSORIES, SERVICES AND SUPPLIES.
duration_in_months: But the duration of the contract is not available.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01003817
* **Solicitation Number:** 2023-00384
* **Publication Date:** August 9, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 19, 2022, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Contracting Entity:** Canadian Food Inspection Agency
* **Location:** National Capital Region (NCR), Canada
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Tender Description:**
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking a supplier to provide a Reverse Vertical Laminar Flow Cabinet for use in the Ottawa Lab Fallowfield. This opportunity is reserved for suppliers who have a valid Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada.

Suppliers interested in submitting a bid must:

1. Be pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies
2. Download the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI /C from Buyandsell.gc.ca
3. Submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement

Please note that suppliers who do not have a valid Supply Arrangement for the aforementioned commodities cannot submit a bid. Any bids received from such suppliers will not be evaluated.

**Documents:**
The solicitation document and associated information can be accessed through the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/09/311fc3188be56f80d78c595794ef2e71/2023-00384-npp_english.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/09/2bc0275c225658b93d6b1d8a7d798c2e/2023-00384-npp_french.pdf

**Contact Information:**
For further information or clarification on this tender, please contact:

Alexander Lisowski
Email: [Alexander.lisowski@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:Alexander.lisowski@inspection.gc.ca)

Note: The contact phone and fax numbers are not provided as they were not
